[!NOTE] Highlights information that users should take into account, even when skimming. Another line.

A break in the line.

Then some code blocks.

[!WARNING] A warning this time.

[!NOTE] A totally heinoius note.

terraform init

[!NOTE] If you are working with local modules then there is no need to run terraform init before the scan as all files are already present, but remote modules must be fetched in to the .terraform folder before a scan.

Simplest way to run a Trivy misconfiguration scan is to point it at your current folder:

trivy config .
